source.e5eae55f:
# Data Science Bowl 2019: Using a new Python Library called Auto_ViML to automatically build multiple models from a single line of code in this competition
Getting a LB Score in this is as easy as 1-2-3: Follow the 3 steps below:
source.ad2623ea:
1. First open this Kernel will do some feature engg to get you started (Running time: 10 mins):
https://www.kaggle.com/morenoh149/autoviml-quickstart

1. Then Use Auto_ViML to select best features and best model: (Running time: 8 mins)
https://www.kaggle.com/rsesha/starter-autoviml-kernel-demo/edit

1. After that take the best features (about 91) and best model (CatBoost) and fit/predict:
https://www.kaggle.com/rsesha/2019-data-science-bowl-via-autoviml/edit

So totally it should take you about 18 mins to get a LB Score in this completition!
